<noinclude>{{DISPLAYTITLE:Meeting minutes}}</noinclude>
<inputbox>
type=create
default={{CURRENTYEAR}}-{{CURRENTMONTH}}-{{CURRENTDAY2}}
prefix=Minutes/

buttonlabel=Create minutes
break=no
width=24
useve=true

</inputbox>
<includeonly>
===Latest minutes===
<dpl>
titlematch=%Minutes/%
replaceintitle=@Minutes/@,
count=2
ordermethod=lastedit
order=descending
</dpl>
<span class="bi bi-arrow-right-circle"></span> [[{{NAMESPACE}}:{{PAGENAME}}/Minutes|view minutes]]</includeonly>
<noinclude>
